about_the_game:
The Premium Version of Just Act Natural is here! A one time purchase of the Premium Version gets you six all new game modes and 4 new maps! IF THE HOST HAS THE PREMIUM VERSION EVERY IN THE LOBBY HAS ACCESS TO ALL THE GAME MODES AND MAPS



In ASSASSINS all players are HIDERS and must find and kill the other players without revealing themselves.



In DEATH RACE Hider players must race each other to the finish line without being too eager and revealing themselves to the Seeker above!



In addition, this version includes 3 more game modes, including PARTY MODE, which combines all the game modes together randomly!

Finally, the new hand-sculpted CASTLE, SPOODER MINES, STINK CITY and SPACESHIP stages have been added. Walk around as knights and wizards hiding from the Seeker placed in the MIDDLE of the stage!
detailed_description:
The Premium Version of Just Act Natural is here! A one time purchase of the Premium Version gets you six all new game modes and 4 new maps! IF THE HOST HAS THE PREMIUM VERSION EVERY IN THE LOBBY HAS ACCESS TO ALL THE GAME MODES AND MAPS



In ASSASSINS all players are HIDERS and must find and kill the other players without revealing themselves.



In DEATH RACE Hider players must race each other to the finish line without being too eager and revealing themselves to the Seeker above!



In addition, this version includes 3 more game modes, including PARTY MODE, which combines all the game modes together randomly!

Finally, the new hand-sculpted CASTLE, SPOODER MINES, STINK CITY and SPACESHIP stages have been added. Walk around as knights and wizards hiding from the Seeker placed in the MIDDLE of the stage!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core @2Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: 2 GB AMD or NVIDIA Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Premium Version of Just Act Natural is here! A one time purchase of the Premium Version gets you three all new game modes, a new map as well as all future content that will be added to Just Act Natural in the coming months!
